Title: Halloween IV
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Phil Augusta Jackson, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The squad competes in the annual Halloween heist to win the title of Ultimate Detective Slash Genius.
